traits.notes:
Clients are in Workgroup - no onsite AD - it is cloud based directory - see JumpCloud


RADUIS server IPs for client VPN on Meraki:

18.204.0.31

54.203.27.225

Note: any changes in WAN IP address will require update on Jump Cloud to allow authentication.

Azure AD Connect is running on both servers, MCGF-CCE-DC01 and MCGF-CCE-DC02.

The CoreSecret listed below is the domain Admin account.

traits.notes: LAPS is implemented to all member servers and workstations on the domain. Please check ABRY-BOS-UTIL02 to query LAPS UI to get the local admin password of a member server or workstation on the domain

AAD Sync is installed on FTV-CCW-DC1
Idaptive Connector is installed on FTV-CCW-DC1 and FTV-CCE-DC01
Password notification script is located on FTV-CA-DC1 and the task to run it is also scheduled on the same server. (Script lives in C:\Scripts)
Lastpass AD sync tool is on FTV-NY-Utility1

AAD Sync to Office 365 on installed on STNY-DCSRV03
All user attributes must be edited from that server

OPT-CCE-DC02 is required to be online for CyberArk.
New user accounts must be configured in OPT-CCE-DC02 ADUC for access to CyberArk groups.
